title: Complete Residential Exterior Cleaning Services for $999 | Vancouver Package
shortDescription: Professional residential cleaning services in Vancouver & Surrey – Full house exterior cleaning package!
description: Transform your home's exterior with our comprehensive residential cleaning services package for just $999. Our professional cleaning services include house washing to remove dirt and grime, thorough roof cleaning to prevent damage from moss and algae, crystal-clear window washing, complete gutter cleaning to prevent water damage, and powerful pressure washing for driveways and walkways. This residential exterior cleaning package offers exceptional value for homes up to 2500 sqft, combining our most popular cleaning services at a significant discount. As Vancouver's trusted cleaning professionals, we provide eco-friendly exterior cleaning services that restore your home's curb appeal while protecting your investment.
benefits: Complete exterior cleaning in one package

faqItems.question: Who qualifies for the $999 Full House Cleaning Deal?
faqItems.answer: This package is available for standard residential homes up to 2500 Sqft. Custom pricing is available for larger properties.

faqItems.question: Is your cleaning method safe for all surfaces?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We use a combination of soft washing for delicate surfaces (siding, roofs, gutters) and pressure washing for durable surfaces (driveways, patios, sidewalks) to ensure safe and effective cleaning.

faqItems.question: How long does the service take?
faqItems.answer: Most homes are completed within 3-6 hours, depending on size and surface condition.

faqItems.question: Do you service my area?
faqItems.answer: We provide exterior cleaning services in Surrey, Richmond, Vancouver, Burnaby, Coquitlam, Langley, and surrounding regions.

faqItems.question: Are your cleaning products eco-friendly?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we use biodegradable, non-toxic cleaning solutions that are safe for your family, pets, and the environment.

title: Professional Roof Cleaning Services in Vancouver | Remove Moss & Algae
shortDescription: Expert roof cleaning services in Vancouver & Surrey – Soft wash & pressure cleaning specialists!
description: Protect your roof with our professional roof cleaning services in Vancouver and Surrey. We specialize in safe and effective cleaning services for all roof types including asphalt shingles, cedar shakes, tile, clay, metal, and flat roofs. Our comprehensive roof cleaning services remove moss, algae, black streaks, and organic growth that can damage your roofing materials. Using a combination of soft washing and professional cleaning techniques, we ensure your roof is thoroughly cleaned without risking damage. Our residential and commercial roof cleaning services include preventative treatments that help resist future growth, extending your roof's lifespan and maintaining its protective capabilities.

faqItems.question: Is roof cleaning safe for my shingles?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We use gentle soft washing techniques that won't damage your roofing materials while effectively removing moss, algae, and debris.

faqItems.question: How often should I have my roof cleaned?
faqItems.answer: We recommend professional roof cleaning every 2-3 years, or sooner if you notice significant moss or algae growth.

faqItems.question: Will you damage my gutters during roof cleaning?
faqItems.answer: No, our experienced team takes special care around gutters and uses appropriate pressure settings to protect all roofing components.

faqItems.question: Can you prevent moss from growing back?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we offer preventative treatments that help inhibit future moss and algae growth, extending the time between cleanings.

title: Professional Roof Painting Services | Weatherproof Coating & Protection
shortDescription: Expert roof painting services in Vancouver & Surrey – Long-lasting protection & weatherproof coatings!
description: Revitalize your roof with our premium roof painting services in Vancouver and Surrey. Our professional cleaning and painting services offer durable coatings that enhance aesthetics and provide long-lasting protection against the Pacific Northwest elements. As experienced residential and commercial cleaning specialists, we provide comprehensive roof restoration services that combine thorough cleaning with high-quality protective coatings.

faqItems.question: How Long Does Roof Paint Last?
faqItems.answer: With high-quality roof coatings, you can expect 10-15 years of protection before repainting is needed.

faqItems.question: What Type of Roof Paint Do You Use?
faqItems.answer: We use heat-reflective, waterproof, and UV-resistant coatings to enhance durability and energy efficiency.

faqItems.question: Do You Hand Clean the Roof Before Painting?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We use hand cleaning with a wire brush and adjustable pressure washing to remove moss, dirt, and old paint, ensuring proper adhesion.

faqItems.question: Is Roof Painting Safe for My Home?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely! Our low-VOC, eco-friendly roof paints are safe for your family, pets, and environment.

faqItems.question: Can You Paint Over Metal & Tile Roofs?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We specialize in metal roof painting, tile roof coatings, and asphalt shingle restoration.

faqItems.question: Do You Offer Roof Painting in My City?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We provide roof painting services in Surrey, Richmond, Vancouver, Burnaby, Coquitlam, Langley, Delta & surrounding areas.

faqItems.question: How Much Does Roof Painting Cost?
faqItems.answer: Pricing depends on roof size, material, and prep work required. Get a free quote today!

title: Professional Window Washing Services | Residential & Commercial Vancouver
shortDescription: Streak-free window washing services in Vancouver & Surrey – Professional residential & commercial glass cleaning!
description: Let natural light shine through with our professional window washing services in Vancouver and Surrey. Our residential and commercial window cleaning services deliver crystal-clear results for homes and businesses throughout the Lower Mainland. As experienced cleaning professionals, we provide comprehensive window washing services that enhance your property's appearance and extend the life of your windows.

faqItems.question: Do you clean both inside and outside of windows?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we offer complete window cleaning services that include both interior and exterior windows, as well as screens, sills, and tracks.

faqItems.question: Can you remove hard water stains from windows?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we have specialized techniques and solutions for removing mineral deposits, hard water stains, and oxidation from glass surfaces.

faqItems.question: How often should windows be professionally cleaned?
faqItems.answer: For residential homes, we recommend professional window cleaning twice a year. Commercial properties may require more frequent cleaning depending on location and exposure.

faqItems.question: Can you reach high or difficult windows?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely! Our team is equipped with professional water-fed poles, ladders, and safety equipment to reach windows up to four stories high safely and effectively.

title: Professional Post-Construction Cleanup Services Vancouver | Complete Cleaning
shortDescription: Post-construction cleanup services in Vancouver & Surrey – Professional deep cleaning & debris removal!
description: Ensure your newly constructed or renovated property is move-in ready with our thorough post-construction cleaning services. We handle debris removal, surface cleaning, and more.
benefits: Complete cleaning from ceiling to floor

faqItems.question: What is Included in Post-Construction Cleaning?
faqItems.answer: Our service includes dust & debris removal, window & glass cleaning, pressure washing, surface sanitization, and deep cleaning of all areas to make your property move-in ready.

faqItems.question: Do You Remove Construction Waste & Materials?
faqItems.answer: We remove dust, sawdust, drywall debris, paint splatters, and adhesives but do not handle large construction waste.

faqItems.question: How Long Does the Cleaning Take?
faqItems.answer: Depending on the size and condition of the property, cleaning usually takes 4-8 hours. Larger projects may require a full day.

faqItems.question: Do You Clean Windows & Glass After Construction?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We remove paint, dust, and stickers from glass, windows, and mirrors for a streak-free shine.

faqItems.question: Do You Offer Exterior Pressure Washing for Post-Construction Cleanup?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely! We offer pressure washing for driveways, sidewalks, patios, and building exteriors to remove dirt and dust left behind from construction work.

faqItems.question: Do You Use Eco-Friendly Cleaning Products?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We use non-toxic, biodegradable cleaning solutions that are safe for your family and the environment.

title: Professional Gutter Cleaning Services Vancouver | Prevent Water Damage
shortDescription: Reliable gutter cleaning services in Vancouver & Surrey – Inside & outside clearing specialists
description: Keep your gutters free from debris with our expert cleaning services. Prevent clogs and water damage to protect your home's foundation.

faqItems.question: How Often Should I Get My Gutters Cleaned?
faqItems.answer: We recommend gutter cleaning twice a year – once in spring and once in fall – to prevent clogs and water damage.

faqItems.question: Do You Remove All Debris from Gutters?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We remove leaves, dirt, branches, moss, and any blockages in gutters & downspouts.

faqItems.question: How Do You Clean Gutters Safely?
faqItems.answer: We use hand cleaning, low-pressure washing, and gutter flushing to ensure effective and damage-free cleaning.

faqItems.question: Do You Offer Gutter Whitening & Stain Removal?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely! Our service includes gutter brightening to remove dirt, oxidation, and mildew stains for a clean, fresh look.

faqItems.question: What Happens If My Downspouts Are Clogged?
faqItems.answer: We provide downspout flushing to remove clogs and ensure proper water flow away from your home.

faqItems.question: Do You Offer Gutter Repairs or Gutter Guard Installation?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We can fix minor gutter issues and install gutter guards to prevent future clogging.

title: Professional Pressure Washing Services Vancouver | Residential & Commercial
shortDescription: Expert pressure washing services in Vancouver & Surrey – Professional residential & commercial cleaning solutions!
description: Restore your property's appearance with our professional pressure washing services. We use state-of-the-art equipment and eco-friendly cleaning solutions to safely remove dirt, grime, mold, and stains from various surfaces. Our experienced technicians adjust the pressure and technique according to each surface type, ensuring thorough cleaning without causing damage. From concrete and brick to wood and vinyl, we have the expertise to handle all exterior surfaces.
benefits: Prevents damage from mold and mildew
Extends the lifespan of exterior surfaces
Prepares surfaces for painting or sealing
keyFeatures: Variable pressure capabilities for different surfaces
Hot and cold water washing options

faqItems.question: Is pressure washing safe for all exterior surfaces?
faqItems.answer: No, not all surfaces can handle high pressure. We adjust our equipment settings and techniques for each surface type, using lower pressure for delicate surfaces and soft washing when appropriate.

faqItems.question: How often should I have my property pressure washed?
faqItems.answer: For most properties in the Vancouver area, we recommend pressure washing once a year to prevent buildup of mold, algae, and dirt. Properties in heavily wooded areas or near water may benefit from cleaning twice a year.

faqItems.question: Will pressure washing damage my plants and landscaping?
faqItems.answer: We take special precautions to protect your landscaping, including covering sensitive plants and using eco-friendly cleaning solutions that won't harm your vegetation.

faqItems.question: Can pressure washing remove oil stains from my driveway?
faqItems.answer: Yes, our specialized cleaning solutions combined with appropriate pressure washing techniques can remove most oil stains from concrete and asphalt surfaces.

faqItems.question: How long does pressure washing take?
faqItems.answer: The time required depends on the size of the area and level of dirt. Most residential jobs can be completed in 2-4 hours, while larger commercial properties may take a full day.

title: Professional House Washing Services Vancouver | Residential Property Cleaning
shortDescription: Expert exterior house washing services in Vancouver & Surrey – Safe soft washing and pressure washing for all home types!
description: Transform your home's exterior with our comprehensive house washing services. We combine gentle soft washing techniques with appropriate pressure washing methods to safely clean all types of siding, from vinyl and stucco to wood and brick. Our trained professionals use specialized equipment and eco-friendly solutions to remove years of dirt, algae, mold, and atmospheric pollutants that can damage your home's exterior and affect its curb appeal.
benefits: Prevents damage from mold and algae

faqItems.question: Is house washing safe for all types of siding?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we use appropriate cleaning methods for each siding type. Delicate surfaces like wood or stucco receive gentle soft washing, while durable materials can handle higher pressure washing.

faqItems.question: How often should I have my house washed?
faqItems.answer: We recommend house washing annually in the Vancouver climate to prevent buildup of moss, algae, and atmospheric pollutants that are common in our humid environment.

faqItems.question: Will house washing damage my windows or landscaping?
faqItems.answer: No, our trained technicians take special care to protect windows and landscaping. We cover plants and use controlled pressure around windows and sensitive areas.

faqItems.question: Can house washing remove all stains?
faqItems.answer: Most common stains from dirt, algae, and mildew can be removed. For stubborn stains, we may need to use specialized treatments or inform you of permanent discoloration.

faqItems.question: Do you clean gutters as part of house washing?
faqItems.answer: Basic gutter exterior cleaning is included. For interior gutter cleaning and maintenance, we offer that as a separate comprehensive service.
